logic

Class Drunken

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Character
      • logic.Guard
        • logic.Drunken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestDrunken

    public class Drunken
extends Guard
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy). This specific type (pseudo)randomly "fall asleep", stopping its movement for a (pseudo)randomly amount of Game updates.
    Author:
    Jo√£o Vieira, Susana Lima
    See Also:
